personalInfo.name: Priya Lamichhane
personalInfo.title: Nepalese | B.A.LLB | Corporate Lawyer & Open Knowledge Advocate

workExperience.title: Project Coordinator
responsibilities: Coordinated workshops and training on open data literacy.
Managed partnerships with government, educational, and private sectors.
Led Public Bodies Datathons and Women In Data Conference initiatives.
Supported data governance frameworks and technical service delivery.
Facilitated data analysis and visualization capacity-building sessions.

workExperience.title: Legal Consultation
responsibilities: Drafted, reviewed, and negotiated SLAs, vendor contracts, MoUs.
Advised on regulatory compliance (net neutrality, cybersecurity, telecom laws).
Managed consumer complaints, copyright claims, and defamation cases.
Oversaw data handling, privacy policies, and user consent.

workExperience.title: Assistant Compliance Officer
responsibilities: Ensured compliance with environmental, labor, and corporate governance laws.
Drafted and reviewed PPAs, O&M agreements, internal contracts.
Supervised corporate operations and project management guidelines.

internshipTasks: Tasks included legal research, drafting agreements, intellectual property review, and litigation support.
awards: Millennium Fellowship Project – United Nations Academic Impact 2022
Young Ambassador of Peace in Asia (YAPA), 2025
Women in Data Conference Project Coordinator, 2025
Right to Information Activist – The Accountability Lab Nepal
Best Presenter, International Seminar on Research and Legal Research Trend, 2020

publications.title: Wilderness of Women's Safety in Informal Employment
Introduction to Prison and Parole System of Nepal
